content.rendered:
At Bridge Careers, we understand that the process of relocating to a new country for work can be both exciting and overwhelming. That's why we offer a range of relocation services to assist our clients in making a smooth transition to their new work environment.

Everything at Bridge Careers Travel Agencies is shaped by the value we place on people. We don’t simply want to find our candidates a place, we want to place them in the best possible opportunity for long term success.

we're here to support you every step of the way healthcare, industrial, administrative, manufacturing, and finance sectors, and we strive to be the preferred relocation agencies for candidates and companies throughout the region.

Our Team

Cory Minter

Cory is a published author and recruiting professional with 20 years of experience in the staffing industry. He provides the leadership vision for Bridge Careers Services and focuses much of his time on building strong relationships with each of Trinity's clients. From day one, he established honesty, integrity, and respect for people as the foundational values for Bridge Careers Services. He believes this has been critical to the sustained success Bridge Career has experienced. Cory enjoys the outdoors, spending time with Amber and their children, and serving in his local church. Cory graduated from Oklahoma State University with a degree in Communications and is an active member of American Staffing Association.

Amber Minter

Amber is an experienced professional who has spent much of her career serving in executive level positions in marketing and operations. She provides leadership and strategic direction for all of Trinity's payroll, HR, and accounting services and is committed to providing an industry leading relocation experience for everyone Bridge Career serves. She is a proven problem solver and takes great pride in identifying the right solutions for her employees and her customers. Amber graduated from Evangel University in Springfield, Missouri is an active member of SHRM, TAHRA and the American Staffing Association. Amber loves spending time outdoors with her family and is always looking for opportunities to serve the community through her local church and the non-profits Bridge Career supports.

Kassi Freeze

Kassi serves as the Recruiting Manager at Bridge Career and also leads the medical recruiting side of the company. She has been working with medical professionals since she was 16, when she started as a CNA at a local hospital in southeastern Oklahoma, and later moved up to management. Her professional experience has uniquely equipped her to understand exactly what employees and employers need out of their next hire, and she is driven to find the best "fit" for everyone. She is a tremendous leader and enjoys seeing other people succeed. Kassi loves to cook and spend time with her family camping and fishing across Oklahoma.

Ericka Sherod

Ericka serves as the Sales Manager at Bridge Career and is a Certified Personnel Consultant, Certified Temporary Staffing Specialist, and Master Business Coach. She has served in a number of capacities within the staffing industry including VP of Sales, General Manager, and Operations Manager. With over 20 years in temp and direct hire staffing, she brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to the Bridge Career team that benefits everyone she engages with. She loves working in a positive team environment and understands the impact that hiring the right people can have on a company's culture. Ericka loves to read, volunteer at her church, and spend time with her husband and their 20 grandchildren!

Our Relocation Services May Include:

Medical

  • LPN / RN
  • Medical Assistant
  • Medical Billing
  • Medical Coding
  • Medical Front Office
  • Medical Scheduler
  • Nurse Practitioner (NP)
  • Physician’s Assistant (PA)
  • Radiology
  • Referral / Auth Specialists

Industrial

  • Assembly
  • General Labor
  • Industrial Painter
  • Machinist
  • Maintenance Tech
  • Mechanic
  • Parts Counter
  • Shipping / Receiving
  • Warehouse
  • Welder / Fitter

Professional

  • Accounting
  • Administrative Assistant
  • Banking
  • Collections
  • Customer Service
  • Data Entry
  • Human Resources
  • Loan Processor
  • Management
  • Paralegal

excerpt.rendered: At Bridge Careers, we understand that the process of relocating to a new country for work can be both exciting and overwhelming. That's why we offer a range of relocation services to assist our clients in making a smooth transition to their new work environment. Our relocation services include assistance with travel documents, logistics, and accommodations. We aim to provide personalized and comprehensive support to ensure that you have a stress-free experience as you embark on your new professional journey. […]
